title: Is placements same for PES RR and PES EC campus?
content:
Hey folks,
I wanted to know if the placement is same for both PES RR and PES EC campus?
I mean, if a company visits PES RR, will the EC campus students be eligible for that company?

comments.body: If you had cared to look at the FAQs and previous posts, you would have realized placements are pooled
Yeah. I went through previous posts but didn't find anything related to this.

Lmao at least don't blatantly lie. Here's the FAQ link: https://bit.ly/pesu-faq

Check the RR vs EC comparison post.
